# Do you...

* ... use `python` or `R` to produce your figures?
* ... write technical reports / journal articles?
* ... present your results at conferences?
* ... want to develop your personal website?
* ... **not want to have to learn LaTeX and HTML?**

## Consider using Quarto

* Documents:
  [HTML](https://quarto-dev.github.io/quarto-gallery/page-layout/tufte.html), [PDF](https://github.com/nmfs-opensci/quarto_titlepages/blob/main/example_1.pdf), [MS Word](https://quarto-dev.github.io/quarto-gallery/articles/msword/msword.docx)
* Presentations:
  [RevealJS](https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/revealjs/demo/#/title-slide), [MS PowerPoint](https://quarto-dev.github.io/quarto-gallery/presentations/powerpoint/powerpoint.pptx), [Beamer](https://quarto-dev.github.io/quarto-gallery/presentations/beamer/beamer.pdf)
* [Websites](https://2024.gisruk.org/)

* Journal templates: [PLOS](https://quarto-journals.github.io/plos/),
  [more...](https://quarto.org/docs/extensions/listing-journals.html)
